Description: Collaboration and work management. Smartsheet is used to assign tasks, track project progress, manage calendars, share documents and manage other work.
Name: Smartsheet

Methods.Name: Get Sheet
Methods.Description: Gets a Sheet. For retrieving "Column_Title":"Cell_Value" data add [rows].<column_title> to your response fields in connector settings, where <column_title> is the name of the column in your sheet.

Methods.Name: List Sheets
Methods.Description: Gets the list of all Sheets, in alphabetical order, by name.

Methods.Name: List Updated Rows
Methods.Description: Gets a sheets rows modified since last run. For retrieving "Column_Title":"Cell_Value" data add [rows].<column_title> to your response fields in connector settings, where <column_title> is the name of the column in your sheet.

Methods.Name: Add First 10 Cells to Row
Methods.Description: Inserts one row into the Sheet with 10 cells

Methods.Name: Get Row
Methods.Description: Gets a row from a Sheet.

Methods.Name: Delete Row
Methods.Description: Deletes a row from a Sheet.

Methods.Name: Add Row(s)
Methods.Description: Inserts one or more rows into the Sheet. Provide values for your columns using Custom Fields with Field Locations of [cells].COLUMN_ID, e.g. "[cells].123456". You can find the Column IDs using the "List Columns" method.

Methods.Name: List New Rows
Methods.Description: Gets a sheets rows added since last run. For retrieving "Column_Title":"Cell_Value" data add [rows].<column_title> to your response fields in connector settings, where <column_title> is the name of the column in your sheet.

Methods.Name: List Columns
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Columns belonging to the Sheet.

Methods.Name: Delete Column
Methods.Description: Deletes a column from the Sheet.

Methods.Name: Get Column
Methods.Description: Gets a column from a Sheet

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Gets the list of all Users

Methods.Name: List Events
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the events occurring in your Smartsheet organization account.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: Gets the list of all Groups.
